hero.name: Fujitayusuke
hero.subtitle: Building Full Stack solutions with a focus on problem-solving and teamwork!
hero.description: My projects reflect a high level of proficiency in leveraging modern tools and technologies such as React, Ballerina, MongoDB, Python and Docker to build scalable and impactful solutions.

about.description: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js. I'm a quick learner and collaborate with team members to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch &
contact.name: Your Name
contact.messagePlaceholder: What do you want to say?

subscription.title: Build and deploy a subscription tracking backend server
subscription.desc: Skip the basic CRUD - this Backend is all about building a production-ready Subscription Management System with real users, real money, and real business logic. JWT authentication, database modeling, API architecture, security, automated workflows, and much more!

horizon.title: Horizon – A Next.js-powered financial SaaS platform!
horizon.desc: Built with Next.js, Horizon enables users to connect multiple bank accounts, track real-time transactions, transfer funds securely, and manage their finances efficiently.

readme.title: Readme API - Show your top 10 collaborators
readme.desc: Developed a customizable API to generate contributor images for GitHub profile README files, showcasing the top 10 contributors in an engaging way.

powerOutage.title: Power outage notification system
powerOutage.desc: Developed a desktop application to provide timely notifications about scheduled power outages when the economic crisis time period in the Sri Lanka 2022, helping users prepare for electricity blackouts.

iphone.title: iPhone 15 Pro 3D website clone
iphone.desc: Recreated the iPhone 15 Pro 3D website from scratch, delivering an immersive and interactive user experience. Built using React and Three.js for advanced 3D animations and visual effects.

movieLand.title: Movie Land
movieLand.desc: Check out Movie Land, a dynamic movie-searching app I built using React. It lets you browse movies by title, fetches real-time data via APIs, and delivers a seamless user experience.

hutch.title: Hutch mobile app redesign concept
hutch.desc: Using Figma, I aimed to create a modern, user-friendly interface that enhances the overall experience while maintaining a clean and vibrant aesthetic.

flag.title: Sri Lanka Flag Animation
flag.desc: a tribute to the vibrant spirit of Sri Lanka! Using only HTML5 and CSS3, this project brings the a flag to life with smooth, dynamic animations—no JavaScript or external libraries involved!

netflix.title: Netflix-UI project
netflix.desc: I've cloned the Netflix landing page using HTML5 and CSS3. This project is a great example of creating modern web interfaces with a clean, visually appealing design.

audi.title: Audi-UI, a front-end project replicating the sleek landing page of the Audi Sri Lanka website!
audi.desc: Built using HTML5 and CSS3, this project showcases attention to design detail and responsive web development skills.It's a visually appealing and lightweight clone, perfect for exploring UI design techniques.

spotify.title: Spotify-UI, my project inspired by the sleek and iconic Spotify web player interface!
spotify.desc: Crafted entirely with HTML5 and CSS3, this project captures the essence of modern web design. While it's not yet responsive, it's a bold step towards mastering UI replication and front-end development.

intern.title: Intern Software Engineer
points: 06 months of internship as a software engineer developing next.js based web applications

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate
points: Undergraduate in Information and Communication Technology honours degree

tips.welcome: Welcome to my portfolio! Explore my portfolio using the menu above.
tips.projects: Check out the Projects section to see my latest work.
tips.mobile3d: 3D models are limited to mobile devices due to performance issues. Sorry!
tips.desktop: For the best experience, view this portfolio on a laptop or desktop computer.
tips.refresh: If the 3D models disappear suddenly, try refreshing the page.
tips.cv: You can have my CV in the navigation menu. Just check it out!
tips.contact: You can contact me through the Contact section at the bottom of the page.
tips.interact: Feel free to interact with the 3D objects whenever possible!
tips.endMessage: You have reached the end of my portfolio. I am feeling confident and want to see how much?
